issue.title: [Java] Use IPC continuation token to mark EOS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6519](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6519). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For Arrow stream in non-legacy mode, the EOS identifier should be \{0xFFFFFFFF, 0x00000000}. This way, all bytes sent by the writer can be read.
